```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(PMCMRplus)
```

## Data
Weiss and Martindale S1 Database
```{r}
database <- readxl::read_xls("S1 Database.xls")
```

## Dweller Test
```{r kruskal-wallis}
kruskal.test(x = database$Dweller_diversity, g = database$Algae_score)
```

```{r nemenyi}
kwAllPairsNemenyiTest(x = database$Dweller_diversity, g = database$Algae_score)
```

## Coral Test
```{r kruskal-wallis}
kruskal.test(x = database$Coral_diversity, g = database$Algae_score)
```

```{r nemenyi}
kwAllPairsNemenyiTest(x = database$Coral_diversity, g = database$Algae_score)
```
